Steven A. R. Dow.

Experience
Architect.

I'm a multidisciplinary Designer focussed on UX, UI and product design with more than twenty years of design experience.

I partner with teams around the globe and lead design engagements for fortune 500 companies ranging from single app design to enterprise-scale implementation, creating unique customer experiences for millions of users.

I feel most comfortable working with diverse and multicultural teams, but I am also effective and efficient on my own.

Iâ€™m able to bring a concept through the entire design lifecycle, from conceptualization through implementation. I always make sure my concepts and design solutions are well thought through, and based on thorough research.

I keep abreast with the latest developments in design and technology. I have a strong attention to detail, alongside the abilities to listen effectively, work as a team, and I'm strong at aligning with stakeholders.

What
others
say.

Steven took significant ownership of the tasks in his area - he clearly communicated his strengths (and weaknesses) leaned into discussions with the customer - did thorough research and came back with solid arguments and clear recommendation.

Steven was a great addition to the team - he quickly caught up to speed with our community product - and I especially liked there was no reluctance to deep dive into new areas for Steven.

Director, Technical Consulting at Salesforce

He Art Directed the branding of the iPhone and Android app and a small team of three designers. Steven did an excellent job and became an essential part of the agile development team.

The client was a bit nervous in the beginning and wasn't sure we could deliver a proper solution, but with your politeness and experience, they changed their mind very quickly.
